channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.title: The Spy Who Loved Me
channel.desc: Bond film starring Roger Moore and Barbara Bach, 1977. 007 investigates when a British submarine that is holding nuclear warheads vanishes suddenly while on a routine patrol.

channel.desc: The vets investigate why a senior cat is out of sorts, Rusty the Labrador's lost appetite puzzles vet James, and a specialist hydrotherapy clinic aids two dogs' mobility. S1 Ep3.

channel.title: Lingo
